intro: I am a motivated software engineer passionate about leveraging AI to solve real-world problems and drive innovation. At Johns Hopkins, I’ve demonstrated leadership and technical expertise across multiple impactful roles.

educations.description: Relevant coursework: Machine learning, Deep learning, Reinforcement learning, Large language models, Data structures, Algorithms, Cloud-native architecture & microservices, Web development, Computer vision, NLP, Classical AI.
Gained expertise in self-driving car technology, covering deep learning, computer vision, sensor fusion, and control systems.
Developed strong problem-solving and engineering skills, with coursework in robotics, control systems, and computational mechanics.

expertise.title: Full-Stack Software Dev
expertise.description: Developed a network productivity iOS app using React, Redux, ExpressJS, MongoDB, and AWS. Implemented backend features such as contact grouping, AI-powered message generation, authentication, and payments.

expertise.title: ML & AI
expertise.description: Led AI projects involving LLMs, computer vision, clustering, and retrieval-augmented generation. Built pipelines automating document processing and classification using deep learning models.

expertise.title: Robotics & Automation
expertise.description: Led AI projects involving LLMs, computer vision, clustering, and retrieval-augmented generation. Built pipelines automating document processing and classification using deep learning models.

experiences.description: Employee #10 at an early-stage startup, developing a network productivity iOS app. Built backend for contact grouping, AI-powered message generation, OAuth authentication, and Stripe payments. Deployed the app on the Apple Store.

Developed a web app using React and ExpressJS to provide high school students with driving training tutorials and quizzes to enhance hazard perception. Integrated driving simulation modules for hands-on training. The app is currently deployed in Washington, D.C., serving over 2,000 students.
Doubled student membership YoY through several initiatives inluding AI workshops, live coding demos, Kaggle competitions, industry speaker sessions and research projects.

Built a full pipeline automating web scraping and clustering of 50,000 documents by signature, achieving 92% accuracy and reducing the project timeline from 1 year to 3 months. Used YOLO V11 and ConvNext for feature extraction and clustering.

Led a team to develop a web app translating American Sign Language into AI-generated English voice in real-time. Integrated Google Mediapipe CV model for hand pose estimation, a fine-tuned vision transformer for gesture classification, and ElevenLabs for text-to-speech. Secured $12,000 in funding, participated in two incubators, and won a $2,000 judge prize at Spark Showcase..
Developed a software tool to automate design workflow by 10x, designed the Cybertruck wiper system & Model 3 pedestrian safety system, and invented a wiper mechanism (Intl. Patent WO2023107343).

projects.title: AI Research Trends Dashboard
projects.description: Developed FastAPI microservices with SQS queueing to automate daily ingestion, embedding & clustering of research papers. Used Kubernetes to deploy Docker containers & Amplify to host frontend.

projects.title: LLM RAG Chatbot App
projects.description: Designed & deployed a RAG app with a chatbot interface, leveraging LangChain for an agentic framework, Llama model for LLM, Pinecone for vector database, and FastAPI + Next.js + TailwindCSS for web development.

projects.title: Multi-agent LLM Job Search Platform
projects.description: Built an event-driven architecture for a job search and resume generation platform using AWS Lambda & EventBridge. Integrated LangChain with ChatGPT for dynamic API calls and Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG).
